attributes.additional_details: Cancel GCSEs and take predicted grades or mock gcse grades
attributes.background: Considering the global emergency which we are going through at the moment it is putting us under lots of stress plus we don’t even know when we are sitting them!

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
